actor_awards.notes: Mature won the Best Actor award at the 1948 Locarno International Film Festival for 'Kiss of Death'. He received a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for Motion Pictures at 6780 Hollywood Blvd. He also won Photoplay Awards for Best Performance for 'My Gal Sal' (1942) and 'Kiss of Death' (1947).

filmography.title: Samson and Delilah
filmography.role_description: The biblical judge of immense strength who is betrayed by the woman he loves, leading to his capture, blinding, and ultimate redemptive sacrifice.
filmography.plot: A Danite with superhuman strength falls in love with a Philistine woman who discovers the secret of his power and betrays him to her people.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Art Direction, Best Costume Design; Golden Globe: Nominated – Best Cinematography

filmography.title: My Darling Clementine
filmography.role_description: A brooding, tubercular surgeon-turned-gambler who rules Tombstone and forms an uneasy alliance with Wyatt Earp leading up to the O.K. Corral.
filmography.plot: Wyatt Earp and his brothers arrive in Tombstone and align themselves with the lawless Doc Holliday to face off against the Clanton gang.

filmography.title: Kiss of Death
filmography.role_description: A small-time crook who turns state's evidence to protect his family, finding himself caught between the law and a sadistic killer.
filmography.plot: An ex-con tries to go straight but is dragged back into the underworld when he agrees to help the D.A. catch a giggling psychopath.
filmography.awards: Locarno International Film Festival: Win – Best Actor (Victor Mature)

filmography.title: The Robe
filmography.role_description: A Greek slave who becomes a devout Christian after witnessing the crucifixion of Jesus and guarding his robe.
filmography.plot: A Roman tribune who commands the unit that crucifies Jesus is tormented by his conscience and the power of the robe he won in a dice game.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Motion Picture – Drama; Oscar: Win – Best Art Direction, Best Costume Design

filmography.title: One Million B.C.
filmography.role_description: A prehistoric caveman from the aggressive Rock Tribe who is banished and learns compassion from the peaceful Shell Tribe.
filmography.plot: A caveman is exiled from his tribe and meets a woman from a more civilized tribe, uniting their people against dinosaurs and natural disasters.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nominated – Best Special Effects, Best Score

filmography.title: The Egyptian
filmography.role_description: A brilliantly ambitious warrior who rises to become the commander of the Egyptian armies and eventually Pharaoh.
filmography.plot: In ancient Egypt, a poor orphan becomes a brilliant physician and journeys across the known world, witnessing the rise of a new religion.

filmography.title: After the Fox
filmography.role_description: A hilarious self-parody where Mature plays an aging, vain American movie star lured into a heist disguised as a film production.
filmography.plot: A criminal mastermind escapes from prison and poses as a film director to smuggle gold bars into Italy, duping a fading movie star in the process.

filmography.title: Cry of the City
filmography.role_description: A tough, ethical police lieutenant who must hunt down a childhood friend who has become a cop-killing career criminal.
filmography.plot: A career criminal kills a cop and escapes from the prison ward, leading a determined detective on a chase through New York City.

filmography.title: I Wake Up Screaming
filmography.role_description: A sports promoter who turns a waitress into a star, only to become the prime suspect when she is murdered.
filmography.plot: A promoter is accused of murdering a model he helped make famous and is hounded by a sinister, obsessive detective.

filmography.title: The Shanghai Gesture
filmography.role_description: A cynical, languid gigolo with a fez who manipulates the patrons of a Shanghai gambling den.
filmography.plot: A ruthless casino owner in Shanghai executes a plan of revenge against the man who betrayed her years ago, using his daughter as a pawn.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nominated – Best Art Direction, Best Score

filmography.title: Violent Saturday
filmography.role_description: A courageous family man and mining engineer who stands up to bank robbers when they take over his town.
filmography.plot: Three bank robbers case a small mining town, unaware that their plan will intersect with the dramatic personal lives of the locals.

filmography.title: Gambling House
filmography.role_description: A gambler facing deportation who tries to clear his name and prove his worth as an American citizen.
filmography.plot: A petty crook facing deportation after being acquitted of murder tries to find a way to stay in the U.S. through philanthropy.

filmography.title: Fury at Furnace Creek
filmography.role_description: A tough adventurer who goes undercover to clear his general father's name after a massacre at a western fort.
filmography.plot: A general is falsely accused of provoking an Indian massacre, prompting his son to hunt down the true culprits.

filmography.title: Easy Living
filmography.role_description: A star football quarterback who learns he has a heart condition and must face life without the game that defines him.
filmography.plot: A pro football star struggles with the realization that his career is ending due to health issues and a materialistic wife.

filmography.title: The Big Circus
filmography.role_description: A driven circus owner who battles sabotage, financial ruin, and a rival circus to keep his show on the road.
filmography.plot: A circus owner must deal with a saboteur, a loan shark, and a temperamental troupe to ensure his show's success.

filmography.title: Chief Crazy Horse
filmography.role_description: Mature plays the legendary Lakota warrior who leads his people in a fight to preserve their land and way of life.
filmography.plot: The story of the famous Sioux chief who defeated Custer at Little Bighorn, focusing on his visions and leadership.

filmography.title: Zarak
filmography.role_description: An Afghan chieftain's son who becomes a notorious bandit and revolutionary hero on the Northwest Frontier.
filmography.plot: Banished by his father, a warrior becomes an outlaw leader and eventually sacrifices himself to save the British officer hunting him.

filmography.title: The Glory Brigade
filmography.role_description: An American lieutenant of Greek heritage who must learn to trust and fight alongside Greek soldiers in the Korean War.
filmography.plot: An American engineering unit in Korea is assigned to work with a Greek battalion, leading to cultural clashes and battlefield heroism.

filmography.title: Safari
filmography.role_description: A white hunter in Kenya seeking revenge against the Mau Mau rebels who killed his family.
filmography.plot: A professional hunter leads a wealthy client on a safari while secretly hunting the Mau Mau terrorists who murdered his son.

filmography.title: Hannibal
filmography.role_description: The brilliant Carthaginian general who leads his army and elephants across the Alps to attack Rome.
filmography.plot: Hannibal crosses the Alps with his elephants to attack Rome, capturing a senator's daughter along the way.

filmography.title: Million Dollar Mermaid
filmography.role_description: A promoter who helps Australian swimmer Annette Kellerman become a synchronized swimming star.
filmography.plot: A biography of Annette Kellerman, the Australian swimming champion who overcame polio to become a movie star.

filmography.title: Wabash Avenue
filmography.role_description: A scheming casino owner in 1890s Chicago who vies for the affection of a saloon singer.
filmography.plot: Two men compete for the love of a shimmy dancer in 1890s Chicago.

filmography.title: Stella
filmography.role_description: An insurance investigator who becomes involved with a wacky family trying to hide an accidental death.
filmography.plot: A family tries to cover up the accidental death of an uncle to avoid a scandal, but complications ensue when an insurance agent arrives.

filmography.title: Moss Rose
filmography.role_description: A wealthy gentleman who is blackmailed by a chorus girl after she sees him leaving the scene of a murder.
filmography.plot: A chorus girl blackmails a man she suspects of murder into taking her to his country estate so she can become a lady.

filmography.title: Betrayed
filmography.role_description: A flamboyant and reckless Dutch resistance leader during WWII whose true allegiances come into question.
filmography.plot: A Dutch intelligence officer suspects a resistance leader known as 'The Scarf' may be a traitor collaborating with the Nazis.

filmography.title: Interpol
filmography.role_description: A determined anti-narcotics agent who travels across Europe to hunt down a drug lord who murdered his sister.
filmography.plot: An Interpol agent chases a drug dealer across Europe to avenge the death of his sister.

filmography.title: The Sharkfighters
filmography.role_description: A naval officer and survivor of a shark attack who is tasked with testing a shark repellent for downed pilots.
filmography.plot: A team of scientists and navy men work to develop a shark repellent to protect sailors stranded at sea.

filmography.title: Androcles and the Lion
filmography.role_description: A Roman captain who is captivated by a Christian woman he is escorting to the Colosseum.
filmography.plot: A Christian tailor who befriends a lion is captured by Romans and sentenced to death in the arena, where he meets the lion again.
